issue.title: [CF 159] Additional spells
issue.body:
I don't know if you want to limit pre-added spells, but I made a list with some corrections and additional spells/categories. At least they can be useful in a PvP environment. I would love to see them added.

-------DEBUFFS-----

CROWD CONTROL

51209    -- Hungering Cold
605    -- Mind Control, already in PSpells, add to cc?

;51209;605

---

STUNNED

91797    -- Monstrous Blow (Buffed Ghoul)
47481   -- Gnaw (Ghoul)
12355   -- Impact
24394    -- Intimidation
83047    -- Improved Polymorph
39796    -- Stoneclaw Stun
93986    -- Aura of Foreboding Root/Stun
89766    -- Axe Toss
54786    -- Demon Leap
20253    -- Intercept. You have 20252, I _believe_ this is the correct debuff spellid

;91797;47481;12355;24394;83047;39796;93986;89766;54786;20253

---

DISORIENT

88625    -- Holy Word: Chastise
90337    -- Bad Manner (monkey)

;88625;90337

---

SILENCED

81261   -- Solar Beam
31935    -- Avenger's Shield

;81261;31935;18425;31117

;45334;19306;55080;87195;63685;19387

76577    -- Smoke Bomb, not sure where this would fit, might be best to add it induvidually if needed

82691    -- Ring of Frost, Move from Stun --> Crowd Control


> Posted by CurseForge user Catok | Imported from CurseForge issue #159 | Raw

comments.body:
Thank you very much! You were right about intercept stun.

About smoke bomb: it is an interesting case, because it is a debuff whether it is friendly or hostile.

I moved hand of sac to defensive buffs, and renamed "Helpful Buffs" to "Misc. Helpful Buffs" because, well, all buffs are generally helpful.

Added deterrence and last stand to defensive buffs

Edited Apr 12, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
